document.text:
From: "Miller, Michael"  
To: ' >, 
mberrnannysdchambers@nysd.uscourts.govm <bermannysdchambers@nysd.uscourts.gov> 
Cc: ' , 'Martin 
Weinber 
Subject: RE: U.S. v. Epstein, 19 Cr. 490 (RMB), letter motion for order of nolle prosequi 
Date: Mon, 19 Aug 2019 20:00:32 +0000 
Thank you, Mike 
Michael C. Miller 
Partner 
Steptoe 
Steptoe & Johnson LLP 
1114 Avenue of the Americas I New York, NY 10036 
www.steptoe.com 
This message and any attached documents contain information from the law firm Steptoe & Johnson LLP that may be confidential and/or privileged. If you 
are not the intended recipient, please do not read. copy, distribute. or use this information. If you have received this transmission in error, please notify the 
sender immediately by reply e-mail and then delete this message. 
From: 
Sent: Monday, August 19, 2019 3:57 PM 
To: 'bermannysdchambers@nysd.uscourts.gov' <bermannysdchambers@nysd.uscourts.gov> 
Cc: 'Martin Weinberg' 
Weingarten, Reid >; Miller, Michael
Subject: RE: U.S. v. Epstein, 19 Cr. 490 (RMB), letter motion for order of nolle prosequi 
To the Chambers of Judge Berman: 
Attached please find a courtesy copy of the Government's letter motion requesting that the Court approve the enclosed 
proposed order of nolle prosequi, in connection with the above-captioned case, filed this afternoon. Defense counsel is 
copied. 
Thank you, 
Assistant U.S. Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
EFTA00019988
